name: Awaiting One Input
description:
A very short, very simple proof-of-concept.

It's the first legitimate prototype I've ever built, with not much to it.

The basic idea is you only get one input to play the entire game, start-to-finish, which means a lot of trial and error, and investigation.

NOTE: The Goal is to kill the dragon that sleeps in the cave.

Maybe a bit tedious, VERY bare-bones. If I get more done before the deadline I'll update it, but otherwise, I hope it's found to be interesting!

Made within 42 Hours for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam
